title: HAP 17 - Event Horizon - African Philosophy of Time
itunes:title: HAP 17 - Event Horizon - African Philosophy of Time
description: John Mbiti’s influential and controversial claim that traditional Africans experience time as having “a long past, a present, and virtually no future.”
content:encoded: John Mbiti’s influential and controversial claim that traditional Africans experience time as having “a long past, a present, and virtually no future.”
itunes:subtitle: John Mbiti’s influential and controversial claim that traditional Africans experience time as having “a long past, a present, and virtually no future.”
itunes:summary: John Mbiti’s influential and controversial claim that traditional Africans experience time as having “a long past, a present, and virtually no future.”
itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
